info.name: [Fulfillment Inbound (FBA) API v2024] Use-Cases
info.description:
The Selling Partner API for Fulfillment By Amazon (FBA) Inbound. The FBA Inbound API enables building inbound workflowsto create, manage, and send shipments into Amazon's fulfillment network. The API has interoperability with the Send-to-Amazon (STA) Seller Central User Interface.

Refer to the [Fulfillment Inbound API reference](https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/fulfillment-inbound-api-v2024-03-20-reference) for details about API operations and associated data types and schemas. Refer to [Fulfillment Inbound API v2024-03-20 Code Samples](https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/fulfillment-inbound-api-v2024-03-20-code-samples) to learn how to integrate Fulfillment Inbound APIs along with use-cases and sample codes.

In this postman workspace, you see **6 postman collections** covering **end-to-end workflows** for below use-cases:

1. [Small Parcel Delivery (SPD) with Amazon-Partnered Carrier (PCP)](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/39505772/2sAYQWKDdU)
    
2. [Small Parcel Delivery (SPD) with Non-Partnered Carrier (nPCP)](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/39505772/2sAYQWKDdV)
    
3. [Pallets (LTL/FTL) with Amazon Partnered Carrier (PCP)](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/39505772/2sAYQWKDdS)
    
4. [Pallets (LTL/FTL) with Non-Partnered Carriers (nPCP)](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/39505772/2sAYQWKDdT)
    
5. [No Carton Information Known Upfront - Pallets (Non-Partnered Carrier)](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/39505772/2sAYQWKDdR)
    
6. [Fetch Inbound Plan Details - GET Operations](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/39505772/2sAYQWKDZ9)
    

We also have sample solutions covering these end-to-end workflows in our GitHub Sample Code Repo:

- [https://github.com/amzn/selling-partner-api-samples/tree/main/use-cases/fulfillment-inbound](https://github.com/amzn/selling-partner-api-samples/tree/main/use-cases/fulfillment-inbound)
